name: State Code for Beneficiary
description: The social security administration (SSA) standard 2-digit state code of a beneficiary's residence.

fhirMapping.derived: The valueset definition for the SSA state codes can be found at https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/ValueSet-prvdr-state-cd.html
fhirMapping.note: This is always populated regardless of the request header parameter includeAddressFields (True or False)
